TopicTitle: Ambient Noise around KSC fix Appreciation

Articles.Content:
Hey! 

I noticed that somewhere along the line of 1.2 and it's many patches (before and after), the 

Obnoxious midnight birdsong around the Space Centre

issue has been resolved by the addition of some very tasteful and polite crickets.

Props to developers for this small immersive change, don't know if they spotted my previous suggestion.

 

 

Any other small annoyances like these, feel free to post below.
